name: Khet
description:
This is the game Khet! The objective of this 2-player game is to destroy your opponent's pharaoh piece before your opponent destroys yours.

A turn consists of a movement or rotation action, followed by firing your laser. To move a piece, click the desired piece, then click an unoccupied space adjacent to it (diagonals are allowed). To rotate a piece, click the desired piece, then press the left or right arrow. To fire the laser, click the corresponding laser button. The silver player, whose laser button is the one on the bottom right, goes first.

Pieces:

Pharaoh - A circle with a line through it. It is destroyed if it is hit by a laser, which ends the game.

Obelisk - A square. A piece with no reflective surfaces. Used primarily to intercept lasers for the pharaoh

Pyramid - An X missing one line. Can reflect the laser on the two sides with the missing leg. Is destroyed if hit on the other side.

Djed - A diagonal line. This piece is indestructible, and reflects the laser on each of its faces.
